text: Sir George Bailey Sansom KCMG (November 28 1883 – March 8 1965) was a British diplomat, academic, historian and Japanologist.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Sansom, George Bailey" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 822. ==Selected works== * Japan: A Short Cultural History, 1931 * A History of Japan to 1334, 1958 * A History of Japan: 1334-1615, 1961 * A History of Japan, 1615-1867, 1963 ==Honours== * Order of St Michael and St George, Knight Commander (KCMG) ==References== ==Other websites== * "East Asian Studies at Columbia: The Early Years" at Columbia.edu Category:1883 births Category:1965 deaths Category:British Japanologists Category:Knights Commander of the Order of St Michael and St George Category:British diplomats
